name: The Global Conference on Education and Psychology
content: Name of conference: The Global Conference on Education and Psychology (GCEP 2016) Date(s) of conference: June 8th-10th, 2016 Full location details: Hong Kong The Global Conference on Education and Psychology (GCEP 2016) is scheduled to take place in Hong Kong from June 08th-10th 2016\. This conference aims to provide a communication platform for academics, researchers, graduates and industry professionals to not only present their recent and latest researches, but also to share their thoughts and to discuss the future development in the field of global information and management. We sincerely invite contribution in the field of information and management. Papers submitted will be reviewed and notified in groups and in sequence. For more information, please visit: http://gcep-conf.org/ or email: gcep@gcep-conf.org Key dates: Submission Deadline February 25th, 2016 Notification of Acceptance March 15th, 2016 Deadline for registration and final submission April 5th, 2016 Conference Dates June 08th-10th, 2016 Organized by Higher Education Forum 12-1F.,No.129,Sec.1,Fuxing S.Rd.,Taipei,Taiwan Tel:+886 2 2740 1498 Fax:+886 2 2752 2642 Courtyard By Regal Airport Hotel--- 9 Cheong Tat Road, Hong Kong International Airport, Chek Lap Kok, Hong Kong Phone: (852) 2286 8888 Email: info@airport.regalhotel.com
